title: BarmyBasket
author: BarmyBasket
created_time: December 09, 2022, 07:32:31 AMLast edit: December 27, 2022, 03:19:11 PM by BarmyBasket
content: I signed up for Chips.gg 2 days ago and I deposited $2500.I took some types of bet were World cup football, Nba and Evoulation casino games and I did 15.500 dollars and could not withdraw my money last 2 days. Meanwhile, I uploaded 3 level KYC documents in my account and it was approved On 9.12.2022, A person named Anderson from live support said that Claiming I was abusing Rollbit, which is the same infrastructure but another site, and said that they would delete all my wins from his account and close my membership. I can play games and deposit and withdraw money in my account at Rollbit. There is no abuse.Even continues in our Affiliate partnership with Rollbit. I learned that there are many people in Chips.gg who are experiencing the same situation, I hope you guys care Types of bets I play: https://i.hizliresim.com/ndi29cc.pngExcuses :https://i.hizliresim.com/rc9dosr.pngEvo : https://i.hizliresim.com/incrclj.pngChips Co Founder : https://twitter.com/The_Magalon Â @The_MagalonQuoteThe player was flagged immediately by our sportsbook providers' risk management system for placing value bets on player props.@chipsgg my bets: https://i.hizliresim.com/88773pp.pngI present to you again the proof that I bought the NBA bets from @chipsgg from another casino and that there are similar scales. (holiganbet.com)https://i.hizliresim.com/7lkomif.pngTrey Murph 2.5 3point over 1.79 Â  ///// Chipsgg odds >> Trey Murph 2.5 3point fieled over 1.85Paolo Banchero 19.5 point over 1.76 //// Chipsgg odds >> Paolo Banchero 20.5 point over 1.81Shai Gilgeous Alexander 29.5 point under 1.84 Â ///// Chipsgg odds >> Shai Gilgeous Alexander 29.5 Under 2.00 WC player bet tempobet.comhttps://i.hizliresim.com/tj54q5s.pngMorocco-Spain133 passes over Aymeric Laporte 1.88 Â /// Chipsgg oddds>> Laporte 136 passes 1.88Portugal-SwitzerlandAkanji 58.5 passes over 1.88 Â //////////// Chipsgg odds >> Akanji 59passes 1.88Stakebet WC playerbet : https://i.hizliresim.com/bp3owaf.png Aymeric Laporte 133.5 passes 1.89 //// Chipsgg oddds>> Laporte 136 passes 1.88Akanji 59 passes 1.92 Â /// Chipsgg odds >> Akanji 59passes 1.88Comparison of the same bets at Chipsgg and other casinos.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: BarmyBasket on December 09, 2022, 07:32:31 AMMeanwhile, I uploaded 3 level KYC documents in my account and it was approved On 9.12.2022, A person named Anderson from live support said that I was abusing Rollbit, which is the same infrastructure but another site, and said that they would delete all my wins from his account and close my membership. What a bummer, they are not the same casino, whatever someone did on other platform is not their business anymore while talking on their platform's chat . Is this really how support works? Or this is also a decision of the casino as well. @chipsgg if you care maybe you can explain more what happened here.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Is this possible, to punish one player because of the wrongdoing he did in other casinos, does Chips.gg have this in their TOS first time I read something like this and this is not acceptable you treat your player based on the action of your platform not on what he did in another platform this is worse than scamming because the player is innocence, he trusts your casino and believes that you are legit but what you did is something that is quite unbelievable.

The number of years a casino operation does not matter as well. There are lots of them who have once with good reputation then sucks later on.The case OP looks like legit based on the screenshot and it's a very lame excuse for what the support answered. This is a unique case from other casino issue i have read actually, that's why a representative/community manager should be heard here or any gambling community/forum, why this is possible.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Can you please share the whole conversation with the support of Chips.gg. I want to understand furthermore how Rollbit brought up to his issue just to ban his account. I want to be fair here before jumping into conclusion but Iâ€™m sensing that Chips.gg point out an irregularities to the OP while OP stated that he is doing this same method on Rollbit. This is just my assumption because itâ€™s odd for a CS to brought up other casino name out of nowhere. And also please explain whatâ€™s the abuse they are accusing to you because thereâ€™s no clear detail on whatâ€™s your offense aside from your statement and the crop reply of the support. Itâ€™s odd too that Chips.gg support is typing with a lot of typo error. He seems a freelance CS. Â No kidding, Why casino will required KYC if they are just gonna declined the withdrawal of there user? Whatâ€™s the sense of asking KYC documents while the result is already determined.
